Package com.financial.entries

Class PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense

java.lang.Object
com.financial.entries.BudgetEntry
com.financial.entries.BudgetExpense
com.financial.entries.PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense
com.financial.entries.PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense
public class PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense extends PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense
Represents an expenditure within the Co-Funded segment of the Public Investment Budget.

This class extends PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense to handle investment projects that are shared between national and international funding sources. It manages a localized registry of co-funded entries and provides specialized methods for history tracking and global budget adjustments.

  • Field Details

    • pibCoFundedExpenses

      protected static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense> pibCoFundedExpenses

  • Constructor Details

    • PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense

      public PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense(String entityCode, String entityName, String serviceCode, String serviceName, String code, String description, String type, String category, long amount)
      **Initializes** a new Co-Funded investment expense and **registers** it in the global registry.

      This constructor invokes the superclass constructor to populate core financial fields and then appends the newly created instance to the static pibCoFundedExpenses collection for centralized data management.

      Parameters:
      entityCode - **Unique identifier** for the Ministry or government Entity.
      entityName - **Display name** of the Entity.
      serviceCode - **Unique identifier** for the specific Service or Department.
      serviceName - **Display name** of the Service.
      code - **Budget classification code** assigned to this entry.
      description - **Textual summary** describing the expenditure.
      type - **Investment segment type** (e.g., "ΣΥΓΧΡΗΜΑΤΟΔΟΤΟΥΜΕΝΟ").
      category - **Broad classification category** for budget reporting.
      amount - **Monetary value** of the expense as a long.

  • Method Details

    • getAllPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpenses

      public static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense> getAllPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpenses()
      **Returns** the complete static registry of all **co-funded** investment expenses.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all instantiated co-funded records.

    • getPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpensesOfEntityWithCode

      public static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense> getPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpensesOfEntityWithCode(String entityCode)
      **Retrieves** all co-funded expenses associated with a specific **Entity Code**.
      Parameters:
      entityCode - The unique identifier of the Ministry or Agency.
      Returns:
      A list of matching co-funded expenses.

    • getPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpensesOfCategoryWithCode

      public static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense> getPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpensesOfCategoryWithCode(String expenseCode)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      A list of entries within the specified category.

    • findPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpenseWithCodes

      public static PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense findPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpenseWithCodes(String entityCode, String serviceCode, String expenseCode)
      **Locates** a unique co-funded expense record using a combination of identifying codes.
      Parameters:
      entityCode - Unique identifier for the Entity.
      serviceCode - Unique identifier for the Service.
      expenseCode - Unique identifier for the Expense Category.
      Returns:
      The matching PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense object.

    • calculateSum

      public static long calculateSum()
      **Calculates** the total monetary sum of all entries in the **co-funded registry**.
      Returns:
      The aggregated total sum as a long.

    • getSumOfEveryPublicInvestmentCoFundedExpenseCategory

      public static Map<String,Long> getSumOfEveryPublicInvestmentCoFundedExpenseCategory()
      **Generates** a breakdown of total expenditures grouped by **Category** for the co-funded segment.
      Returns:
      A Map with category codes as keys and their total sums as values.

    • getDescriptionWithCode

      public static String getDescriptionWithCode(String code)
      **Retrieves** the textual description assigned to a specific budget code.
      Parameters:
      code - The classification code to look up.
      Returns:
      The description associated with the code.

    • implementGlobalChangesInCertainPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedCategory

      public static void implementGlobalChangesInCertainPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedCategory(String code, double percentage, long fixedAmount)
      **Executes** mass financial changes on a **specific category**. **Stores** a snapshot of the data in ExpensesHistory before applying adjustments.
      Parameters:
      code - The category code to modify.
      percentage - The percentage increase or decrease.
      fixedAmount - The fixed monetary amount to add or subtract.

    • implementGlobalChangesInAllPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedCategories

      public static void implementGlobalChangesInAllPublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedCategories(double percentage, long fixedAmount)
      **Applies** mass financial changes to **all co-funded categories**. **Archives** the current state of all entries in history prior to the update.
      Parameters:
      percentage - The percentage adjustment for all entries.
      fixedAmount - The fixed amount adjustment for all entries.
